definition: during the intervening time, the time between one event, process, or period and another
details:
adverb
- during the intervening time
= example: during the intervening time
= synonyms: meantime, in the meantime
- at the same time but in another place
= example: at the same time but in another place
noun
- the time between one event, process, or period and another
= example: the time between one event, process, or period and another
= synonyms: lag
